channel.title: css-quiz
channel.description: Learn css fundamentals through fun and challenging quizzes!

item.title: Which one is the CSS preprocessor?
item.description: To use a CSS preprocessor, you must install a CSS compiler on your web server. Here are a few of the most popular CSS preprocessors.
item.content:encoded: To use a CSS preprocessor, you must install a CSS compiler on your web server. Here are a few of the most popular CSS preprocessors.

item.title: How to import CSS
item.description: is usually used for or practical purposes. is usually when you have a separate file for your css. usually can be put inside or . For…
item.content:encoded:
Inline style is usually used for specificity or practical purposes.
Link tag is usually when you have a separate file for your css.
Style tag usually can be put inside or . For writting all the css part of the website. Without having external css

item.title: Which one is not the CSS framework?
item.description: CSS framework is a solution to build consistent, effective, clean, responsive and powerfull style for your web apps. Here are a few of the…
item.content:encoded: CSS framework is a solution to build consistent, effective, clean, responsive and powerfull style for your web apps. Here are a few of the most popular CSS frameworks.

item.title: Which HTML tag is used to define internal stylesheet?
item.description: The HTML element contains style information for a document, or part of a document. It contains CSS, which is applied to the contents of the…
item.content:encoded:
The HTML <style> element contains style information for a document, or part of a document. It contains CSS, which is applied to the contents of the document containing the <style> element.

Read for detail here

item.title: What does css stand for?
item.description: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and lay out web pages. Read for detail here
item.content:encoded:
CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and lay out web pages.

Read for detail here

item.title: Reasons to use BEM (Block, Element, Modifier) in CSS?
item.description: BEM stands for Block Element Modifier and is an HTML & CSS naming methodology. BEM offers benefits in the Modularity, Reusability, and…
item.content:encoded:
BEM stands for Block Element Modifier and is an HTML & CSS naming methodology. BEM offers benefits in the Modularity, Reusability, and, structure of your CSS code for your project.

To learn more about BEM click here
